类型: Color: Dark Brown Leather Travel Laptop Backpack
评论详情: Solid backpack that easily handles my laptop, tablet and accessories with plenty room left over for anything ekse. It would get 5 for durability, looks, quality of zrppers and seams and quality of leather.  It lacks multiple compartments inside the main bag.  It has an open pouch for laptop or tablet plus 2 side by side much smaller pouches on the opposite side that don't serve much purpose since they are open and whatever you put in there will be out onto the large body of the bag. There are 3 covered pouches on the outside, a half size pouch in front with magnetics snaps that is suitable for a phone and wallet and 2 small pouches on either side with magnetic snaps.  I don't think you can go wrong with this large backpack it does everything advertised though I found it to be short on compartments.  It's definitely a good value for the money.

类型: Color: Black Leather Travel Laptop Backpack
评论详情: For the price, I expected it to not be real leather, but the information saying this is made from PU is buried in the description. It has the distinct PU look, which isn't necessarily bad, but you have to be okay with a shiny black. The material feels thin, but all of the zippers work fine and it's roomy inside.

This backpack has every compartment imaginable. Outer side pockets to hold a cell phone and a tumbler/water bottle. Inner compartments to hold a laptop, pencils, books, calculators, change, clothing... anything imaginable. Outer pockets on the front, top and back! The outer fabric of this is faux leather feeling, but it looks SO good! The inner herringbone fabric is a wonderful touch. I love this backpack and I look forward to traveling with it.

类型: Color: Light Brown Leather Travel Laptop Backpack

类型: Color: Dark Brown Leather Travel Laptop Backpack
评论详情: Very nice quality bag. Has a dark, rich chocolate color and looks like real leather, but is on the thinner side. It also turned out to be a bit smaller than I was expecting (about medium sized) but still fairly spacious.  Lots of pockets on the inside and outside of the bag. The main compartment zips up top, as well as snaps close in the front. The snaps are pretty secure— they actually stay closed once you snap them in place. The padded straps make it comfortable to carry.  All in all, very satisfied with the look and performance of this bag.

类型: Color: Light Brown Leather Travel Laptop Backpack
评论详情: Overall, I like the rich light brown color and design of this laptop backpack. It's smooth to the touch. Size-wise, it can fit a small laptop, up to 15 inches. The belt-strap style also gives it a nice, rugged and vintage look to it. The outer edges of the backpack straps have these dark brown outlines, giving the straps a cool and stylish look. Zippers work smoothly thus far. I love the overall design and color.

类型: Color: Light Brown Leather Travel Laptop Backpack
评论详情: Fell in love with the color. Its just gorgeous. Front look is genuine leather look a like. Looks really high end and luxurious. Inside has big laptop pocket and two small slip in pockets. Main zipper runs smoothly. Front and two side pockets has magnetic button closures. Easy! Back side is mesh-y which looks sort of low end. But besides that it is a BEAUTIFUL BAG. And definitely looks very very luxurious.

类型: Color: Blue Leather Travel Backpack Purse
评论详情: I actually got this for air travel.  It's not too big yet small enough that you can carry it on a plane and put it under the seat in front of you.  It has plenty of room on the inside to hold your purse, make up bag, and other things you might want to carry rather than pack in your suitcase.  There are the attached straps to carry it over your back plus an extra strap that will allow you to carry it like a purse.  I like the denim-like color and I feel it's reasonably priced and good quality.

类型: Color: Dark Brown Leather Travel Laptop Backpack
评论详情: This is a nice backpack with secure stitching.  It is comfortable to wear.  The straps are leather, but the rest appears to be pleather.  The pockets have nice magnetic closures.  It is a medium size, it has a dedicated compartment for a laptop.  I am pleased with the comfort and look of it.  I have taken away one star because I don't think it will age like real leather.

类型: Color: Blue Leather Travel Backpack Purse
评论详情: The look of this leather backpack is amazing. The compartment is deep and wide enough for laptop and books. The straps are strong and sturdy. the zippered compartments are deep. This is a unique and chic looking backpack.
